    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92165</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92165</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mixing small particles of solids in liquids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mischende Teilchen der Körper in den 
Flüssigkeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Petites particules de mélange des solides dans 
les liquides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Partículas pequenas misturando dos sólidos nos 
líquidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Particelle piccole di miscelazione dei solidi in 
liquidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίξη των μικρών μορίων των στερεών στα υγρά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Partículas pequeñas que se mezclan de sólidos 
en líquidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that when solid glucose is dissolved in water, the glucose molecules and the water molecules are mixed up and form a clear solution.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">material properties</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixtures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sugar</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt daß, wenn feste Glukose im
Wasser aufgelöst wird, die Glukosemoleküle und die Wassermoleküle 
werden oben gemischt und eine freie Lösung bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que quand le glucose 
plein est dissous dans l'eau, les molécules de glucose et les 
molécules d'eau sont mélangées vers le haut et forment une solution
claire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que quando o glucose 
contínuo é dissolvido na água, as moléculas do glucose e as 
moléculas de água são misturadas acima e dão forma a uma solução
desobstruída.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che quando il 
glucosio solido è dissolto in acqua, le molecole del glucosio e le 
molecole di acqua sono mescolate in su e formano una soluzione libera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι όταν διαλύεται η 
στερεά γλυκόζη στο ύδωρ, τα μόρια γλυκόζης και τα μόρια ύδατος 
αναμιγνύονται επάνω και διαμορφώνουν μια σαφή λύση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que cuando la glucosa 
sólida se disuelve en agua, las moléculas de la glucosa y las 
moléculas de agua se mezclan para arriba y forman una solución 
clara.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
